name: The Blue Lotus NFT by Tintinimaginatio powered by arteQ

metadata.name: The Blue Lotus NFT #0972
metadata.description: Tintinimaginatio in partnership with artèQ has released 1777 unique digital Tintin NFT of the world famous illustration project for the cover of "The Blue Lotus" book, sent by Hergé to his publisher on February 12th, 1936. This collection is individually numbered (written in Chinese characters) with having specific GPS coordinates of a "Tintin location". Each NFT will unlock a world of utilities. © Hergé / Tintinimaginatio 2023.
